Issue.creator: suryalnvs
Issue.summary: Process is hanging if peer join is failed in PTE
Issue.description: (node:110) UnhandledPromiseRejectionWarning: Unhandled promise rejection. This error originated either by throwing inside of an async function without a catch block, or by rejecting a promise which was not handled with .catch(). (rejection id: 1) (node:110) DEP0018 DeprecationWarning: Unhandled promise rejections are deprecated. In the future, promise rejections that are not handled will terminate the Node.js process with a non-zero exit code. This error originated either by throwing inside of an async function without a catch block, or by rejecting a promise which was not handled with .catch().
